```{r}
z.prop.test<-function(p1, n1, p0, p2=NULL, n2=NULL,  alternative="two-sided", CI=.95)
{
if(p1 == 0) {
return (0)
} else {
return ((p1 - p0 ) / sqrt((p0(1-p0))/n1))
}
}
{
if(p0 == 0) {
return (0)
} else {
return ((p1 - p0 ) / sqrt((p0(1-p0))/n1))
}
}
z.prop.test(p1=.33, n1=60, p0=.21)
```
